snippet: Ryan Sawyer, Darius Jones, and Shahzad Ismaily took the stage in the Northern Spy record label’s Spy Festival, in a night of free improvising in stifling heat.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews performance by Ryan Sawyer, Darius Jones, and Shahzad Ismaily at the Stone as part of the Spy Music Festival.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Sawyer, Darius Jones, and Shahzad Ismaily took the stage in the Northern Spy record label’s Spy Festival, in a night of free improvising in stifling heat.

headline.seo: Darius Jones, Ryan Sawyer and Shahzad Ismaily at the Stone
headline.main: A Trio in Its Infancy, Creating an All-New Sound
headline.print_headline: A Trio in Its Infancy, Creating an All-New Sound
